metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7427 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
The broadcast mode replay prevention functionality in ntpd in NTP before 4.2.8p9 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (reject broadcast mode packets) via a crafted broadcast mode packet.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7427` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ntp - 1:4.2.8p9+dfsg-2ubuntu1
ntpdate - 1:4.2.8p9+dfsg-2ubuntu1
sntp - 1:4.2.8p9+dfsg-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> ntp-4.2.8p6, up to but not including ntp-4.2.8p9, and ntp-4.3.90 up to, but not including ntp-4.3.94.  introduced with CVE-2015-7973 patch

criterions.comment: ntp package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:4.2.8p9+dfsg-2ubuntu1').
